title: Calm Down Guys! The Viral Invitation Card Of Ranbir Kapoor & Alia Bhatt's Wedding Is Fake
text:
Cupid struck for Alia and Ranbir on the sets of their upcoming film Brahmastra and they have been inseparable since then. The closeness between their families have increased too.

As if wedding rumors were not enough that now a card hinting at their Winter wedding in January is doing rounds on the internet. In dramatic twist of events, a wedding card announcing Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt's wedding details surfaced on the social media circuit.

It was enough to kick-start the impending wedding rumours.

Don't Miss 141 SHARES 34.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 5 K SHARES

Just a few days ago, Alia Bhatt had spoken to a publication and revealed how safe it feels with Ranbir. She had said,

“No. It’s not a relationship. It’s a friendship. I’m saying this with all genuineness and honesty. It’s beautiful. I’m walking on stars and clouds right now. The best part is that we’re two individuals who are living our own professional lives in its full form right now. He’s shooting continuously. So am I. It’s not a situation where you’ll see us constantly together. That’s the true mark of a comfortable relationship. Nazar na lage.”

Neither Ranbir nor Alia have responded to the rumored wedding invitation.
description: As if wedding rumors were not enough that now a card hinting at their Winter wedding in January is doing rounds on the internet. In dramatic twist of events, a wedding card announcing Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt's wedding details is doing rounds on the internet.
